set.name: CoroCoro Jokers and Nature Double Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard a Jokers creature that costs 6 or less from your hand. If you do, use one of its abilities that start with "When you put this creature into the battle zone".
